synopsis.text: Fuuta, after a long day of work, eagerly anticipates the comfort of his home and the company of his new feline companion. Despite being a novice cat owner, he is captivated by the enigmatic behaviors and charming quirks of his furry friend. As they navigate through their shared journey of understanding and bonding, Fuuta finds himself unable to envision life without his beloved cat. This heartwarming comedy offers a delightful exploration of the unique bond between a man and his pet, filled with endearing surprises and tender moments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
